channel.title: Need help changing teleport name - devolution v7

item.title: Need help changing teleport name - devolution v7
item.dc:creator: @akanaz akanaz
item.description:
@akanaz wrote:

Hey Man,

To change the name, let’s use yanille teleport for an example, you will change the yanille teleport text to whatever you want, and below that there is another few words, which is the text it says int he black box when you put cursor over it. Eg. Teleport Back Home. To chnage the co-ordinates for a teleport all you do it look up the x co ordinate by typing ::mypos and you search that in your client.java until you come to something like:

triggertele: x-coord, y,coord

Just change them to the co ordinates you want to be teleported to when using that teleport.

Hope i helped.

Thanx

Read full topic
item.source: Need help changing teleport name - devolution v7

item.title: Need help changing teleport name - devolution v7
item.dc:creator: @MasterZer0 MasterZer0
item.description:
@MasterZer0 wrote:

sendQuest("Yanille Teleport", 13037); sendQuest("Teleport back home", 13038); sendQuest("@gre@0/0", 13042); sendQuest("@gre@0/0", 13043); sendQuest("@gre@0/0", 13044); sendQuest("Seers Teleport", 13047); sendQuest("Visit the land of trees", 13048); sendQuest("@gre@0/0", 13051); sendQuest("@gre@0/0", 13052); sendQuest("Dragon Cave Teleport", 13055); sendQuest("Beware of Dragons", 13056); sendQuest("@gre@0/0", 13059); sendQuest("@gre@0/0", 13060); sendQuest("Catherby Teleport", 13063); sendQuest("Visit the ocean and mountains", 13064); sendQuest("@gre@0/0", 13067); sendQuest("@gre@0/0", 13068); sendQuest("Legends Guild Teleport", 13071); sendQuest("Visit the guild", 13072); sendQuest("@gre@0/0", 13076); sendQuest("@gre@0/0", 13077); sendQuest("@gre@0/0", 13078);
It has to be one of the lines above that say @gre@0/0. I’m not sure which one but you’ll have to experiment so just modify all the names… for example.

sendQuest("Yanille Teleport", 13037); sendQuest("Teleport back home", 13038); sendQuest("@gre@1", 13042); sendQuest("@gre@2", 13043); sendQuest("@gre@3", 13044); sendQuest("Seers Teleport", 13047); sendQuest("Visit the land of trees", 13048); sendQuest("@gre@4", 13051); sendQuest("@gre@5", 13052); sendQuest("Dragon Cave Teleport", 13055); sendQuest("Beware of Dragons", 13056); sendQuest("@gre@6", 13059); sendQuest("@gre@7", 13060); sendQuest("Catherby Teleport", 13063); sendQuest("Visit the ocean and mountains", 13064); sendQuest("@gre@8", 13067); sendQuest("@gre@9", 13068); sendQuest("Legends Guild Teleport", 13071); sendQuest("Visit the guild", 13072); sendQuest("@gre@10", 13076); sendQuest("@gre@11", 13077); sendQuest("@gre@12", 13078);
Just experiment ;).

item.title: Need help changing teleport name - devolution v7
item.dc:creator: @Zero_XL Zero XL
item.description:
@Zero_XL wrote:

i need help with my teleports for my server…
i would like annakarl teleport switched to Ice queen teleport
how would i do that?
i can change the cords for annakarl teleport and others shown below… just not names

this is all i see that has to do with teleports in client for devolution v7

sendQuest("Yanille Teleport", 13037); sendQuest("Teleport back home", 13038); sendQuest("@gre@0/0", 13042); sendQuest("@gre@0/0", 13043); sendQuest("@gre@0/0", 13044); sendQuest("Seers Teleport", 13047); sendQuest("Visit the land of trees", 13048); sendQuest("@gre@0/0", 13051); sendQuest("@gre@0/0", 13052); sendQuest("Dragon Cave Teleport", 13055); sendQuest("Beware of Dragons", 13056); sendQuest("@gre@0/0", 13059); sendQuest("@gre@0/0", 13060); sendQuest("Catherby Teleport", 13063); sendQuest("Visit the ocean and mountains", 13064); sendQuest("@gre@0/0", 13067); sendQuest("@gre@0/0", 13068); sendQuest("Legends Guild Teleport", 13071); sendQuest("Visit the guild", 13072); sendQuest("@gre@0/0", 13076); sendQuest("@gre@0/0", 13077); sendQuest("@gre@0/0", 13078);

[code]// clicking most buttons
		actionButtonId = misc.HexToInt(inStream.buffer, 0, packetSize);
		if (!validClient)
			break;
		if (!antiHax())
			break;
		resetAction();
		println("ab=" + actionButtonId);
		if (duelButton(actionButtonId)) {
			break;
		}
		switch (actionButtonId) {
		case 4140: // varrock teleport -bakatool
			triggerTele(3210, 3424, 0, false);
			break;
		case 4143: // lumbridge teleport -bakatool
			triggerTele(3222, 3218, 0, false);
			break;
		case 4146: // falador teleport -bakatool
			triggerTele(2964, 3378, 0, false);
			break;
		case 4150: // camelot teleport -bakatool
			triggerTele(2757, 3478, 0, false);
			break;
		case 6004: // ardougne teleport -bakatool
			triggerTele(2662, 3305, 0, false);
			break;
		case 6005: // Watchtower teleport -bakatool
			triggerTele(2549, 3113, 0, false);
			break;
		case 29031: // Trollheim Teleport -bakatool
			triggerTele(3285, 3343, 0, false);
			break;
		case 51023: // Carrallanger teleport -bakatool
			triggerTele(2444, 3090, 0, false);
			break;
		case 51031: // Annakarl Teleport -bakatool
			triggerTele(2717, 9816, 0, false);
			break;
		case 51039: // Ghorrock Teleport -bakatool
			triggerTele(3091, 3963, 0, false);
			break;[/code]

Thanks
